verses.verse: Now Joshua <WH3091> was old <WH2204> [and] advanced <WH935> in years <WH3117> when the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, "You are old <WH2204> [and] advanced <WH935> in years, <WH3117> and very <WH3966> much <WH7235> of the land <WH776> remains <WH7604> to be possessed. <WH3423>
"This <WH2088> is the land <WH776> that remains: <WH7604> all <WH3605> the regions <WH1552> [of] the Philistines <WH6430> and all <WH3605> [those of] the Geshurites; <WH1651>

from the Shihor <WH7883> which <WH834> is east <WH5921> <WH6440> of Egypt, <WH4714> even as far <WH5704> as the border <WH1366> of Ekron <WH6138> to the north <WH6828> (it is counted <WH2803> as Canaanite <WH3669>); the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines: <WH6430> the Gazite, <WH5841> the Ashdodite, <WH796> the Ashkelonite, <WH832> the Gittite, <WH1663> the Ekronite; <WH6139> and the Avvite <WH5761>

to the south, <WH8486> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of the Canaanite, <WH3669> and Mearah <WH4632> that belongs to the Sidonians, <WH6722> as far <WH5704> as Aphek, <WH663> to the border <WH1366> of the Amorite; <WH567>

and the land <WH776> of the Gebalite, <WH1382> and all <WH3605> of Lebanon, <WH3844> toward the east, <WH4217> <WH8121> from Baal-gad below <WH8478> Mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768> as far <WH5704> as Lebo-hamath.

"All <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> from Lebanon <WH3844> as far <WH5704> as Misrephoth-maim, all <WH3605> the Sidonians, <WH6722> I will drive <WH3423> them out from before <WH4480> <WH6440> the sons <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> only <WH7534> allot <WH5307> it to Israel <WH3478> for an inheritance <WH5159> as I have commanded <WH6680> you.
"Now <WH6258> therefore, apportion <WH2505> this <WH2088> land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> to the nine <WH8672> tribes, <WH7626> and the half-tribe of Manasseh. <WH4519>"

With the other half-tribe, the Reubenites <WH7206> and the Gadites <WH1425> received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> them beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> to the east, <WH4217> just <WH9201> as Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5414> to them;

from Aroer, <WH6177> which <WH834> is on the edge <WH8193> of the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon, <WH769> with the city <WH5892> which <WH834> is in the middle <WH8432> of the valley, <WH5158> and all <WH3605> the plain <WH4334> of Medeba, <WH4311> as far <WH5704> as Dibon; <WH1769>

and all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> as far <WH5704> as the border <WH1366> of the sons <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983>

and Gilead, <WH1568> and the territory <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and Maacathites, <WH4602> and all <WH3605> Mount <WH2022> Hermon, <WH2768> and all <WH3605> Bashan <WH1316> as far <WH5704> as Salecah; <WH5548>

all <WH3605> the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan, <WH1316> who <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Ashtaroth <WH6252> and in Edrei <WH154> (he alone was left <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of the Rephaim <WH7497>); for Moses <WH4872> struck <WH5221> them and dispossessed <WH3423> them.

But the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did not dispossess <WH3423> the Geshurites <WH1651> or the Maacathites; <WH4602> for Geshur <WH1650> and Maacath <WH4601> live <WH3427> among <WH7130> Israel <WH3478> until <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Only <WH7534> to the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> he did not give <WH5414> an inheritance; <WH5159> the offerings <WH801> by fire <WH801> to the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> are their inheritance, <WH5159> as He spoke <WH1696> to him.
So Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> [an inheritance] to the tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> according to their families. <WH4940>

And their territory <WH1366> was from Aroer, <WH6177> which <WH834> is on the edge <WH8193> of the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon, <WH769> with the city <WH5892> which <WH834> is in the middle <WH8432> of the valley <WH5158> and all <WH3605> the plain <WH4334> by Medeba; <WH4311>
Heshbon, <WH2809> and all <WH3605> its cities <WH5892> which <WH834> are on the plain: <WH4334> Dibon <WH1769> and Bamoth-baal and Beth-baal-meon,
and Jahaz <WH3096> and Kedemoth <WH6932> and Mephaath, <WH4158>
and Kiriathaim <WH7156> and Sibmah <WH7643> and Zereth-shahar on the hill <WH2022> of the valley, <WH6010>
and Beth-peor and the slopes <WH794> of Pisgah <WH6449> and Beth-jeshimoth,

even all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH4334> and all <WH3605> the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567> who <WH834> reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> whom <WH834> Moses <WH4872> struck <WH5221> with the chiefs <WH5387> of Midian, <WH4080> Evi <WH189> and Rekem <WH7552> and Zur <WH6698> and Hur <WH2354> and Reba, <WH7254> the princes <WH5257> of Sihon, <WH5511> who lived <WH3427> in the land. <WH776>

The sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> also killed <WH2026> Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor, <WH1160> the diviner, <WH7080> with the sword <WH2719> among <WH413> [the rest of] their slain. <WH2491>

And the border <WH1366> of the sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> was the Jordan. <WH3383> This <WH2088> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and their villages. <WH9161>
Moses <WH4872> also gave <WH5414> [an inheritance] to the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> to the sons <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> according to their families. <WH4940>

And their territory <WH1366> was Jazer, <WH3270> and all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Gilead, <WH1568> and half <WH2677> the land <WH776> of the sons <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> as far <WH5704> as Aroer <WH6177> which <WH834> is before <WH5921> <WH6440> Rabbah; <WH7237>
and from Heshbon <WH2809> as far <WH5704> as Ramath-mizpeh and Betonim, <WH993> and from Mahanaim <WH4266> as far <WH5704> as the border <WH1366> of Debir; <WH1688>

and in the valley, <WH6010> Beth-haram and Beth-nimrah and Succoth <WH5523> and Zaphon, <WH6829> the rest <WH3499> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> with the Jordan <WH3383> as a border, <WH1366> as far <WH5704> as the [lower] end <WH7097> of the Sea <WH3220> of Chinnereth <WH3672> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> to the east. <WH4217>
This <WH2088> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and their villages. <WH9161>

Moses <WH4872> also gave <WH5414> [an inheritance] to the half-tribe of Manasseh; <WH4519> and it was for the half-tribe of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> according to their families. <WH4940>

And their territory <WH1366> was from Mahanaim, <WH4266> all <WH3605> Bashan, <WH1316> all <WH3605> the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> and all <WH3605> the towns <WH2333> of Jair, <WH2971> which <WH834> are in Bashan, <WH1316> sixty <WH8346> cities; <WH5892>

also half <WH2677> of Gilead, <WH1568> with Ashtaroth <WH6252> and Edrei, <WH154> the cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan, <WH1316> [were] for the sons <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> for half <WH2677> of the sons <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> according to their families. <WH4940>

These <WH428> are [the territories] which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> apportioned <WH5157> for an inheritance <WH5157> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab, <WH4124> beyond <WH4480> <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho <WH3405> to the east. <WH4217>

But to the tribe <WH7626> of Levi, <WH3878> Moses <WH4872> did not give <WH5414> an inheritance; <WH5159> the Lord, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> is their inheritance, <WH5159> as He had promised <WH1696> to them.
